You could simply redirect the output of the TextRunner into a file, so it
seems to me.

Regards, Ilja
  -----Original Message-----
  From: Eric Heikkila [mailto:ericheikkila@...]
  Sent: Freitag, 29. M�rz 2002 14:20
  To: junit@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: Re: [junit] Logging tests reports


  I don't believe it does, but it'd be easy enough to do
  by throwing in some Log3J code.

  -Eric

  --- Luis Joaquim <ljoaquim@...>
  wrote:
  > Hello,
  >
  > I am just starting to "discover" JUnit, and I have a
  > begginer's
  > question:
  >
  > Doesn't JUnit keeps the log of executing tests in a
  > file ?
  >
  > Like, how many tests passed, which one failed, ...,
  > and so on?
  >
  > If yes, where ?
  >
  > Thanks in advance,
  >
  > Luis Joaquim
  >
  >
